query:
WITH
       pfe AS (
              UPDATE profile_feed_entries AS pfe
                 SET has_read = coalesce($3, pfe.has_read)
                FROM profile_feeds AS pf
               WHERE pfe.id = $1
                 AND pf.profile_id = $2
           RETURNING pfe.id,
                     pfe.has_read,
                     pfe.profile_feed_id,
                     pfe.feed_entry_id
       )
SELECT pfe.id,
       e.link,
       e.title,
       e.published_at,
       e.description,
       e.author,
       e.thumbnail_url,
       pfe.has_read,
       pfe.profile_feed_id feed_id
  FROM pfe
  JOIN feed_entries AS fe
    ON fe.id = pfe.feed_entry_id
  JOIN entries AS e
    ON e.id = fe.entry_id
